verses.verse: וַיַּאַסְפ֨וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <S%H6430><s%> Now the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4264><s%> their armies לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle וַיֵּאָ֣סְפ֔וּ <S%H622><s%> and were gathered together שֹׂכֹ֖ה <S%H7755><s%> at Shochoh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לִיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> which [belongeth] to Judah וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> between שׂוֹכֹ֥ה <S%H7755><s%> between Shochoh וּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> between עֲזֵקָ֖ה <S%H5825><s%> and Azekah בְּאֶ֥פֶס דַּמִּֽים׃ <S%H658><s%> in Ephesdammim

וְשָׁא֤וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul וְאִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נֶאֶסְפ֔וּ <S%H622><s%> were gathered together וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> by the valley הָאֵלָ֑ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah וַיַּעַרְכ֥וּ <S%H6186><s%> in array מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> and set the battle לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7122><s%> to encounter פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֞ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines עֹמְדִ֤ים <S%H5975><s%> stood אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> on a mountain מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> one וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> on the one side and Israel עֹמְדִ֥ים <S%H5975><s%> stood אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> on a mountain מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> side וְהַגַּ֖יְא <S%H1516><s%> on the other side and [there was] a valley בֵּינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H996><s%> between

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> And there went out אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> he הַבֵּנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H1143><s%> champion מִמַּחֲנ֣וֹת <S%H4264><s%> out of the camp פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines גָּלְיָ֥ת <S%H1555><s%> Goliath שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> named מִגַּ֑ת <S%H1661><s%> of Gath גָּבְה֕וֹ <S%H1363><s%> whose height שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> [was] six אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits וָזָֽרֶת׃ <S%H2239><s%> and a span

וְכ֤וֹבַע <S%H3553><s%> And [he had] an helmet נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> of brass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וְשִׁרְי֥וֹן <S%H8302><s%> with a coat קַשְׂקַשִּׂ֖ים <S%H7193><s%> of mail ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he לָב֑וּשׁ <S%H3847><s%> and he [was] armed וּמִשְׁקַל֙ <S%H4948><s%> and the weight הַשִּׁרְי֔וֹן <S%H8302><s%> of the coat חֲמֵשֶׁת־ <S%H2568><s%> [was] five אֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> thousand שְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels נְחֹֽשֶֽׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> of brass

וּמִצְחַ֥ת <S%H4697><s%> And [he had] greaves נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> upon his legs וְכִיד֥וֹן <S%H3591><s%> and a target נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between כְּתֵפָֽיו׃ <S%H3802><s%> between his shoulders

[וְחָץ כ] (וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H2671><s%> archer ק) חֲנִית֗וֹ <S%H2595><s%> of his spear כִּמְנוֹר֙ <S%H4500><s%> beam אֹֽרְגִ֔ים <S%H707><s%> [was] like a weaver's וְלַהֶ֣בֶת <S%H3852><s%> head חֲנִית֔וֹ <S%H2595><s%> and his spear's שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> [weighed] six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels בַּרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and one bearing הַצִּנָּ֖ה <S%H6793><s%> a shield הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> And he stood וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַעַרְכֹ֣ת <S%H4634><s%> unto the armies יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֔ם לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תֵצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> unto them Why are ye come out לַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <S%H6186><s%> in array מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to set [your] battle הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> not הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H6430><s%> ? [am] not I a Philistine וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> and you עֲבָדִ֣ים <S%H5650><s%> and ye servants לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul בְּרוּ־ <S%H1262><s%> choose לָכֶ֥ם אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> you a man וְיֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> for you and let him come down אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יוּכַ֞ל <S%H3201><s%> If he be able לְהִלָּחֵ֤ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight אִתִּי֙ <S%H854><s%> for וְהִכָּ֔נִי <S%H5221><s%> with me and to kill וְהָיִ֥ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> will become לָכֶ֖ם לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <S%H5650><s%> me then will we be your servants וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I אֽוּכַל־ <S%H3201><s%> but if I prevail לוֹ֙ וְהִכִּיתִ֔יו <S%H5221><s%> against him and kill וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <S%H1961><s%> shall become לָ֙נוּ֙ לַעֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> him then shall ye be our servants וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֹתָֽנוּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistine אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I חֵרַ֛פְתִּי <S%H2778><s%> I defy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעַרְכ֥וֹת <S%H4634><s%> the armies יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> give לִ֣י אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> me a man וְנִֽלָּחֲמָ֖ה <S%H3898><s%> that we may fight יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> When Saul וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> those words הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistine הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיֵּחַ֥תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> they were dismayed וַיִּֽרְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> afraid מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> and greatly פ

וְדָוִד֩ <S%H1732><s%> Now David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> [was] the son אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the man אֶפְרָתִ֜י <S%H673><s%> of the Ephrathite הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> he מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name יִשַׁ֔י <S%H3448><s%> [was] Jesse וְל֖וֹ שְׁמֹנָ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> and he had eight בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וְהָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> men בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> in the days שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul זָקֵ֖ן <S%H2204><s%> [for] an old man בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> went בַאֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> that went שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> And the three בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons יִשַׁי֙ <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse הַגְּדֹלִ֔ים <S%H1419><s%> eldest הָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> [and] followed שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to the battle וְשֵׁ֣ם ׀ <S%H8034><s%> and the names שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> of his three בָּנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> sons אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הָלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> to the battle אֱלִיאָ֣ב <S%H446><s%> [were] Eliab הַבְּכ֗וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn וּמִשְׁנֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4932><s%> and next אֲבִ֣ינָדָ֔ב <S%H41><s%> unto him Abinadab וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖י <S%H7992><s%> and the third שַׁמָּֽה׃ <S%H8048><s%> Shammah

וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַקָּטָ֑ן <S%H6996><s%> [was] the youngest וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> and the three הַגְּדֹלִ֔ים <S%H1419><s%> eldest הָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after that שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> Saul ס

וְדָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> But David הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וָשָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> and returned מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> from Saul לִרְע֛וֹת <S%H7462><s%> to feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father's בֵּֽית־ לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> at Bethlehem

וַיִּגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> drew near הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistine הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> morning וְהַעֲרֵ֑ב <S%H6150><s%> and evening וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> and presented אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> himself forty יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִשַׁ֜י <S%H3448><s%> And Jesse לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now לְאַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> now for thy brethren אֵיפַ֤ת <S%H374><s%> an ephah הַקָּלִיא֙ <S%H7039><s%> parched הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וַעֲשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H6235><s%> [corn] and these ten לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> loaves הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> and these וְהָרֵ֥ץ <S%H7323><s%> and run הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> to the camp לְאַחֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> to thy brethren

וְ֠אֵת <S%H853><s%> עֲשֶׂ֜רֶת <S%H6235><s%> these ten חֲרִצֵ֤י <S%H2757><s%> cuts הֶֽחָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> of cheese הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these תָּבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> And carry לְשַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> unto the captain הָאָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> of [their] thousand וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> how thy brethren תִּפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> and look לְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> fare וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲרֻבָּתָ֖ם <S%H6161><s%> their pledge תִּקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> and take

וְשָׁא֤וּל <S%H7586><s%> Now Saul וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> and they וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> [were] in the valley הָֽאֵלָ֑ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah נִלְחָמִ֖ים <S%H3898><s%> fighting עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> with the Philistines

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּטֹּ֤שׁ <S%H5203><s%> and left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> the sheep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with שֹׁמֵ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> with a keeper וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and took וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יִשָׁ֑י <S%H3448><s%> as Jesse וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> him and he came הַמַּעְגָּ֔לָה <S%H4570><s%> to the trench וְהַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> as the host הַיֹּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> was going forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הַמַּ֣עֲרָכָ֔ה <S%H4634><s%> to the fight וְהֵרֵ֖עוּ <S%H7321><s%> and shouted בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> for the battle
